summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to abatement of and penalties, including license suspension or revocation, for public nuisances; repealing Chapter 10.09 of the Seattle Municipal Code entitled "Public Nuisances" and enacting a new Chapter 10.09 entitled "Chronic Nuisance Properties," and amending SMC Subsection 5.55.230A,Subsection 6.02.270A and Section 6.202.230.
committee: Public Safety, Human Services and Education
